text: Anatoly Arkadyevich Mikhaylov (; 14 September 1936 – 13 June 2022) was a Soviet athlete. He competed mainly in the 110-metre hurdles.Ушел из жизни олимпийский чемпион по легкой атлетике Анатолий Михайлов He competed for the USSR in the 1964 Summer Olympics held in Tokyo, Japan, where he won the bronze medal. Mikhaylov died on 13 June 2022, aged 85.Ушел из жизни олимпийский чемпион по легкой атлетике Анатолий Михайлов ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Hurdlers
title: Anatoly Mikhaylov
